name: Kale Salad with Pineapple Dressing
author: Laine Common
summary: This is our favorite, healthiest treat! Even the kids love it. You can let this sit overnight to help soften the kale, or you can massage it as you toss it. You can add nuts, fruit, or freeze-dried fruit if you wish, but be sure to add any freeze-dried fruit last or it will lose its crunch.
ingredients: 2 bunches kale, stems removed and leaves finely shredded
½ cup sunflower seeds, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Place shredded kale in a large bowl
Mix pineapple, lemon juice, and sunflower oil together in a bowl; pour over kale and toss
